of circulation TABLE III YEARLY AVERAGE CIRCULATION 1817 1818 1819 1820 I82I 1822 1823 3658000 8461000 4809000 4491000 5654000 5306000 4487000 I824 1825 1826 1827 1828  1829 1830 5791000 8825000 9635000 9780000 11067000 13102000 15067000 1831 1832 1833 1834 1835 1836 19035000 19989000 18636000 16790000 22340000 20958000 The average for 1817 is f little value as an average for the bank began oper ations in this year and as a consequence its dealings were too meager until late in the year to make an average just In 1836 only two months January and February are averaged After these months the bank was a state institution 1817 1818 1819 1820 1821 1822 1823 TABLE IV YEARLY AVERAGE DEPOSITS 13413000 11173000 5800000 6693000 6917000 7491000 I 1075000 1824 1825 1826 1827 1828 1829 1830
